channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What We Know About the Winter Storm About to Hit the US—and What We Don’t
item.description: A huge portion of the United States is going to be hit with snow or freezing rain this weekend. Exactly where, what, and how much remains uncertain.

item.title: Blue Origin’s satellite internet network TeraWave will move data at 6 Tbps
item.description: The network will be designed for enterprise, data center, and government customers and could offer an alternative to SpaceX's Starlink service.

item.title: Irony alert: Hallucinated citations found in papers from NeurIPS, the prestigious AI conference
item.description: Research from startup GPTZero points to the impossible problem prestigious conferences face in the age of AI slop.

item.title: The US and China Are Collaborating More Closely on AI Than You Think
item.description: WIRED analyzed more than 5,000 papers from NeurIPS using OpenAI’s Codex to understand the areas where the US and China actually work together on AI re...

item.title: What Type of Mattress Is Right for You? (2026)
item.description: Here’s how to pick the best mattress for your sleep needs, straight from a professional mattress tester.

item.title: Zipline charts drone delivery expansion with $600M in new funding
item.description: That geographic expansion in the United States has fueled Zipline’s delivery numbers. In 2024, the company completed 1 million drone deliveries to cus...

item.title: $100 Off Shark Promo Code | This January
item.description: Shark makes some seriously powerful vacuums, from handheld vacs to steam mops. Don’t miss $100 off, 10% off, and more limited-time coupons from WIRED.

item.title: OpenEvidence hits $12B valuation, with new round led by Thrive, DST
item.description: The medical info database has doubled in valuation since last raise in October, despite encroachment from model makers.

item.title: TCL Knocks $1,000 Off One of Our Favorite Midrange TVs
item.description: The 65-inch QM8K sees a massive discount, with equally generous markdowns on larger models.

item.title: Apps for boycotting American products surge to the top of the Danish App Store
item.description: The boost in downloads comes as Danish consumers have been organizing a grassroots boycott of American-made products, which also included canceling th...
